MAN.TITLE: sobel
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Calculates convolution of input image with Sobel operator.

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: Output matrice. Image to store the edges found by the function.
Size of the extended Sobel kernel.

DESCRIPTION.P: sobel The function Sobel calculates the convolution of the input image"ima_in" with a specified Sobel operator kernel and stores the result in "ima_out".
